title: Looking for someone to carry me to silver and get better at the game!!
body: I am in Bronze at the moment, and i am looking for someone to help me get Silver before the end of Season 6. I am willing to play at lot during the week and hopefully get out of Bronze. If you interested leave you IN GAME NAME and i will add you. Thanks.

replies.body:
IGN Phraser
I'm not the best or anything, I'm bronze as well. But I have the same goal. I have over 350 normals wins ( Pretty Average )
I'm a jg main. 
DMG - Lee, Rengo, Wu and Kha
HP - Shen, Zac and Rammus.
I am able to play one game a day, and around 3 games on weekends.
I'm currently on a win streak.

Yea i don't believe you can get silver, or deserve silver right now(No offence). Unless your a smurf or accounta prodigy at mobas, with only 142 hours of game time on league or 6 days your account, your literally at bronze 5 experience. I don't recommend you play anymore rank games and just stick to playing in normals for at least until you get over 300 wins on normals and have a higher win than lose rate to gain experience. That's only my personal experience and suggestion, but who am i to talk to being just scratching Platimum 5 {{item:3070}}
